title: Troll leather armour
data:
{{version031}} {{armour |name = Troll Leather Armour |cost = ? |AC = 3 |EV = 4 |maxenc = +3 |skill = Dodging |skill2 = Stealth |size = All |grants= [[regeneration|Regen]] }} {{Flavour|A suit of armour made from the stiff and knobbly skin of a troll. It magically regenerates its wearer's flesh. ---- "THE TROLL KING: Now, listen, Prince Peer, and give way to reason!
You're cut out for a troll. Why, look, already
You bear yourself quite in a troll-like fashion!
And you want to become one, don't you?
PEER GYNT: Of course.
In return for a bride and a well-found kingdom
I'm not unwilling to sacrifice something;
But all things have a natural limit.
I have taken a tail, it is true; but, then,
I can undo the knots that our friend has tied
And take the thing off. I have shed my breeches;
They were old and patched; but that won't prevent me
From putting them on if I have a mind to.
I shall probably find it just as easy
To deal with your Trollish way of living.
I can easily swear that a cow's a maiden;
An oath's not a difficult thing to swallow.
But to know that one never can get one's freedom –
Not even to die as a human being –
To end one's days as a Troll of the mountains –
Never go back, as you tell me plainly –
That is a thing that I'll not submit to." -Henrik Ibsen, _Peer Gynt_. 1867.}} '''Troll leather armour''' is one of the lightest [[armour]]s. It has the same defense and encumbrance as [[leather armour]], but also provides Regen+ (+0.80 HP/turn). This bonus does not apply while under [[Inhibited Regeneration|-Regen]]. Note that this armour can be worn by [[Troll]]s, [[Oni]], and [[Spriggan]]s, while regular leather armour cannot. This item has a 33% chance to generate when you slay any [[list of trolls|troll]]. The unique trolls [[Pargi]], [[Parghit]], and [[Snorg]] may drop hides that are already enchanted. The moon troll of [[Lehudib's Moon Base]] will drop the [[moon troll leather armour]] (or an [[artefact]] troll armour, if you've already found it). ==Desirability== Troll leather armour is decent for characters who need to stay unencumbered, as it is very light. The regeneration boost is equivalent to an [[amulet of regeneration]], which is quite strong. It is arguably better than the couple of extra AC you'd get from light [[dragon scales]]. In addition to the combat benefit, it lets you recover faster, reducing the chance you find a monster while resting. In any case, TLA is a direct upgrade to [[leather armour]], and nearly always better than a [[steam dragon scales]]. [[Oni]], [[Troll]]s, and [[Spriggan]]s who have yet to find dragon scales will at least appreciate something heavier to wear. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || Image |- | '''Armour''' || [[File:Troll leather armour.png]] [[File:Deep troll leather armour.png]] [[File:Iron troll leather armour.png]] |- ! || [[Unrandart]]
Troll leather armour |- | '''[[Moon troll leather armour]]''' || [[File:Moon troll leather armour.png]] |} ==History== *Prior to [[0.31]], troll leather armour had a base AC of 4 (and max enchantment of 4). *Prior to [[0.28]], the regeneration property gave +1.0 HP/turn. *Prior to [[0.27]], the regeneration property gave +0.4 HP/turn. *Prior to [[0.20]], all trolls, including [[deep troll|deep]] and [[iron troll]]s, dropped only green armour. *Prior to [[0.19]], this item could be created by using a [[scroll of enchant armour]] on a [[troll hide]]. *Prior to [[0.18]], wearing this armour increased the rate at which the player grew hungry. *Prior to [[0.17]], player [[Troll]]s didn't get a regen bonus for wearing troll leather armour. *Prior to [[0.14]], troll leather armour only provided +30 regeneration rate. {{armours}} [[Category:Body armour]] [[Category:Troll]]
